Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Love & Death
Cast: Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jesse Plemons, , Lily Rabe, , Patrick Fugit
Synopsis: Two churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: Goodfellas
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Ray Liotta, , Joe Pesci, , Lorraine Bracco
Synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: Candy
Cast: Stars:, Jessica Biel, , Melanie Lynskey, , Pablo Schreiber, , Timothy Simons
Synopsis: Candy Montgomery is a 1980s housewife and mother who did everything right. When the pressure of conformity builds within, her actions scream for just a bit of freedom -- until someone tells her to shush -- with deadly results.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Jonah Hill, , Margot Robbie, , Matthew McConaughey
Synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Cast: Director:, Brian Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Angela Bassett, , Laurence Fishburne, , RaéVen Kelly, , Virginia Capers
Synopsis: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Black Bird
Cast: Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Paul Walter Hauser, , Greg Kinnear, , Ray Liotta
Synopsis: Jimmy Keene is sentenced to 10 years in a minimum security prison but he cuts a deal with the FBI to befriend a suspected serial killer. Keene has to elicit a confession from Larry Hall to find the bodies of as many as eighteen women.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: Narcos
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Wagner Moura, , Boyd Holbrook, , Alberto Ammann
Synopsis: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

Synopsis: A journalist's life takes a 360 because of the very system that made her who she is. Will she fight or will she concede?

Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Synopsis: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from sex traffickers.

Synopsis: Oscar-winning producer Albert S. Ruddy's never-before-revealed experiences of making The Godfather (1972).

Synopsis: Candy Montgomery is a 1980s housewife and mother who did everything right. When the pressure of conformity builds within, her actions scream for just a bit of freedom -- until someone tells her to shush -- with deadly results.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Jonah Hill, , Margot Robbie, , Matthew McConaughey
Synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: What's Love Got to Do with It
Cast: Director:, Brian Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Angela Bassett, , Laurence Fishburne, , RaéVen Kelly, , Virginia Capers
Synopsis: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Black Bird
Cast: Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Paul Walter Hauser, , Greg Kinnear, , Ray Liotta
Synopsis: Jimmy Keene is sentenced to 10 years in a minimum security prison but he cuts a deal with the FBI to befriend a suspected serial killer. Keene has to elicit a confession from Larry Hall to find the bodies of as many as eighteen women.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: Narcos
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Wagner Moura, , Boyd Holbrook, , Alberto Ammann
Synopsis: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

Title: Scoop
Cast: Stars:, Karishma Tanna, , Harman Baweja, , Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub, , Inayat Sood
Synopsis: A journalist's life takes a 360 because of the very system that made her who she is. Will she fight or will she concede?

Title: Tombstone
Cast: Directors:, George P. Cosmatos, , Kevin Jarre, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Val Kilmer, , Sam Elliott, , Bill Paxton
Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: Still: A Michael J. Fox Movie
Cast: Director:, Davis Guggenheim, | ,     Stars:, Tracy Pollan, , Sam Fox, , Aquinnah Fox, , Schuyler Fox
Synopsis: Follows the life of beloved actor and advocate Michael J. Fox, exploring his personal and professional triumphs and travails, and what happens when an incurable optimist confronts an incurable disease.

Title: Schindler's List
Cast: Director:, Steven Spielberg, | ,     Stars:, Liam Neeson, , Ralph Fiennes, , Ben Kingsley, , Caroline Goodall
Synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Spartacus

Synopsis: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

Cast: Director:, Alejandro Monteverde, | ,     Stars:, Jim Caviezel, , Mira Sorvino, , Kurt Fuller, , Bill Camp
Synopsis: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from sex traffickers.

Title: Padre Pio

Synopsis: Oscar-winning producer Albert S. Ruddy's never-before-revealed experiences of making The Godfather (1972).

Title: The Big Short
Cast: Director:, Adam McKay, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Steve Carell, , Ryan Gosling, , Brad Pitt

Title: Blonde

Synopsis: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother who's an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the children's imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

Title: Braveheart
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Mel Gibson, , Sophie Marceau, , Patrick McGoohan, , Angus Macfadyen
Synopsis: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: Everest
Cast: Director:, Baltasar Kormákur, | ,     Stars:, Jason Clarke, , Ang Phula Sherpa, , Thomas M. Wright, , Martin Henderson
Synopsis: The story of New Zealand mountaineer Rob Hall, who on May 10, 1996, together with Scott Fischer, teamed up on a joint expedition to ascend Mount Everest.
